title: [PS3] Tony Hawk's Project 8
description:
Hit the half-pipe and skate up a storm with the legendary Tony Hawk.

Tailor-made to take full advantage of the power of PlayStation 3, Tony Hawk's Project 8 immerses players in the definitive skateboarding experience using ultra-realistic graphics, enhanced physics and extremely responsive controls that simulate the feeling of skating with every trick and bail.

The game challenges you to experience the intensity and pressure of skating against the world's top pros, as you aim to become the number one skater in some of the coolest competitions on the planet and establish your town as the hottest skateboard destination around.

Delivering continuous skating action in a free-roaming living environment, Tony Hawk's Project 8 incorporates the series' most popular features, all of which have been enhanced with spectacular next generation technology.

Tony Hawk's Project 8 offers more goals, side missions, secret areas and mini-games than any other Tony Hawk game. You can now track your stats with new in-game record keeping, switch characters mid-game to accomplish a goal, or just skate how you want to skate with no time limits or restrictions.

Skate as some of the world's top pros, or create your own character and take to the half pipe. Either way you'll be playing the most unique, realistic and fun skateboarding game ever created, packed with cool new tricks to discover and huge expansive playing areas for you to "grind", "kickflip" and "ollie" to your heart's content.

Tony Hawk
The most recognisable skateboarder in the world, Tony Hawk is a skater that truly deserves the title of legend. The first person to perform many tricks now considered commonplace, Hawk is most famous for being the first skater to ever pull off the 900, or two and a half full rotations out of a half-pipe.

* Innovative gameplay elements include photographer goals, movable ramps and rails and the ability to watch gameplay unfold on the main screen
* Enhanced physics and responsive controls let you control falls and minimize or maximize damage for fun with the innovative new ragdoll bail mode
* Featuring the voice talents of the world's best loved skaters including Tony Hawk and Bam Margera
